segment.source: How to use the Security and Privacy Settings page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to manage your security zones, privacy settings, and content ratings.
segment.target: How to use the Security and Privacy Settings page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to manage your security zones, privacy settings, and content ratings.

segment.source: Use the Security and Privacy Settings page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Security and Privacy Settings page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Security and Privacy Settings page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Security and Privacy Settings page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Security and Privacy Settings page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you manage your security zones, privacy settings, and content ratings.
segment.target: The Security and Privacy Settings page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you manage your security zones, privacy settings, and content ratings.

segment.source: These settings help restrict the types of content your employees can access from the Internet, including any content that might be considered offensive or otherwise inappropriate in a corporate setting.
segment.target: These settings help restrict the types of content your employees can access from the Internet, including any content that might be considered offensive or otherwise inappropriate in a corporate setting.

segment.source: To use the Security and Privacy Settings page
segment.target: To use the Security and Privacy Settings page

segment.source: Decide if you want to customize your security zones and privacy settings.
segment.target: Decide if you want to customize your security zones and privacy settings.

segment.source: You can pick:
segment.target: You can pick:

segment.source: Do not customize security zones and privacy.
segment.target: Do not customize security zones and privacy.

segment.source: Pick this option if you don’t want to customize your security zones and privacy settings.
segment.target: Pick this option if you don’t want to customize your security zones and privacy settings.

segment.source: Import the current security zones and privacy.
segment.target: Import the current security zones and privacy.

segment.source: Pick this option to import your security zone and privacy settings from your computer and use them as the preset for your employee’s settings.
segment.target: Pick this option to import your security zone and privacy settings from your computer and use them as the preset for your employee’s settings.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: To change your settings, click Modify Settings to open the Internet Properties box, and then click the Security and Privacy tabs to make your changes.
segment.target: To change your settings, click Modify Settings to open the Internet Properties box, and then click the Security and Privacy tabs to make your changes.

segment.source: Decide if you want to customize your content ratings.
segment.target: Decide if you want to customize your content ratings.

segment.source: You can pick:
segment.target: You can pick:

segment.source: Do not customize content ratings.
segment.target: Do not customize content ratings.

segment.source: Pick this option if you don’t want to customize content ratings.
segment.target: Pick this option if you don’t want to customize content ratings.

segment.source: Import the current content ratings settings.
segment.target: Import the current content ratings settings.

segment.source: Pick this option to import your content rating settings from your computer and use them as the preset for your employee’s settings.
segment.target: Pick this option to import your content rating settings from your computer and use them as the preset for your employee’s settings.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Not all Internet content is rated.
segment.target: Not all Internet content is rated.

segment.source: If you choose to allow users to view unrated sites, some of those sites could contain inappropriate material.
segment.target: If you choose to allow users to view unrated sites, some of those sites could contain inappropriate material.

segment.source: To change your settings, click Modify Settings to open the Content Advisor box, where you can make your changes.
segment.target: To change your settings, click Modify Settings to open the Content Advisor box, where you can make your changes.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Add a Root Certificate page or Back to go to the Proxy Settings page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Add a Root Certificate page or Back to go to the Proxy Settings page.
